items.title: 6th New Orleans inmate captured after more than a week on the run
items.description: A sixth man who escaped from a New Orleans jail has been arrested after more than a week on the run, authorities announced.

items.title: Trump pardons Virginia sheriff convicted of federal bribery charges

items.title: Shooting on South Carolina charter boat leaves 11 injured: Police
items.description: At least 11 people were transported to the hospital after a shooting in Little River, South Carolina, on Sunday.

items.title: WATCH:  Truck explosion damages multiple homes in Chicago suburb

items.title: Former Rep. Charles Rangel, who spent 4 decades in Congress, dies at 94
items.description: Former New York Rep. Charles Rangel, a founding member of the Congressional Black Caucus who spent more than four decades in the House, has died at 94...
